name: SAML Configuration Mapping
query: MATCH p=(OIP:GHSamlIdentityProvider)-[:GHHasExternalIdentity]->(EI:GHExternalIdentity) MATCH p1=(OIP)<-[:GHHasSamlIdentityProvider]-(:GHOrganization) MATCH p2=(EI)-[:GHMapsToUser]->() RETURN p,p1,p2
description: Finds SAML Identity Providers, their external identities, and mapped users.
